text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://www.ada.org/snodent
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    133426DGingival RecessionGingival Recession
    157044DBimaxillary protrusionBimaxillary protrusion
    210952DDeep impinging overbite with soft tissue destructionDeep impinging overbite with soft tissue destruction
    210953DAnterior crossbite with destruction of oral mucosaAnterior crossbite with destruction of oral mucosa
    210954DLip incompetence due to horizontal overbiteLip incompetence due to horizontal overbite
    210955DPosterior crossbite limited to left sidePosterior crossbite limited to left side
    210956DPosterior crossbite limited to right sidePosterior crossbite limited to right side
    210957DArticulatory defect secondary to dental defectArticulatory defect secondary to dental defect

name: SnodentOrthodonticDiagnosticFeatureInternational
title: SnodentOrthodonticDiagnosticFeatureInternational
description:
The SNODENT identifiers for gross patient findings that inform the course of orthodontic treatment to be performed.

This value set contains content from SNODENT® Copyright American Dental Association (ADA). All rights reserved. SNODENT is a registered trademark of the ADA.
